html:
Feeling scents
Feeling tastes
Trying to find myself
Among stars on the sky
Heats that kill
Rains that bring relief
Summer at it’s finest
Best to remain in shade
Women expose now
Bits of their bodies
I can’t catch a breath
Because of brown leafs
Chemicals are here
And everywhere around
Yummy yummy poisons
That we mainly agree on
title: Summer
